jsonld.name: Trust Gaps Benchmarks for Shopify Home Decor Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 24 Shopify stores in the home decor industry, measuring trust gaps.

acceptedAnswer.text: Trust Gap Score measures the difference between what shoppers expect and what your store delivers in terms of trust signals. Lower scores indicate better alignment with customer expectations.

mainEntity.name: Why does Trust Gaps matter for home decor stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Home decor involves significant investment and subjective taste. Shoppers need room scene photos, accurate color representation, quality close-ups, and easy returns for items that don't match their vision.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Trust Gaps for Shopify home decor stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 24 Shopify home decor stores, the median trust gaps is 1. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 0. A score of 0 means perfect trust alignment, while higher scores indicate gaps that may hurt conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my home decor store's Trust Gaps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Add authentic customer reviews and ratings prominently on product pages. Display trust badges, security seals, and payment icons clearly. Include detailed shipping and return policy information. Show real-time inventory and social proof (e.g., 'X people viewing'). For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other home decor stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your trust gaps against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 1 (the median), you're in the top half of home decor stores. If you're better than 0, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
